Title: Tex
Writer: S.E. Hinton (novel), Charles S. Haas (screenplay), Tim Hunter (screenplay)
Actors: Matt Dillon, Jim Metzler, Meg Tilly, Bill McKinney
Plot: After their mother dies and their father leaves them, teenage brothers Tex and Mason McCormick struggle to make it on their own.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.
